ygData.subject: Re: 2-Handed Staff Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the same problem. I started with 2H blunt early in my career now I an trying to get my 1H blunt up and it won t budge. Aljernon 12th Level Wizard ...
ygData.messageBody:
I have the same problem. I started with 2H blunt early in my career now I an
trying to get my 1H blunt up and it won't budge.


Aljernon
12th Level Wizard



-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber [mailto:dtaber@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 8:03 PM
To: EverQuest Mailing List
Subject: [eq_wizards] 2-Handed Staff Skill


From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>

When I started, I was using a one-handed staff and my skill rose
relatively quickly to about 25-30. I then switched to 2-Handed
staff to raise that skill, but it has NEVER gone up (while raising
from 6th level to 10th). I tried seeding the skill with a few
training points, and it still has NEVER gone up. Does the game
have an idea of a primary weapon or something? Or have I
just been unlucky on raising the skill?

Thanks,


Soren
